articles.author: Rezaul H Laskar
articles.title: PM Modi confirms he will travel to South Africa for Brics Summit. What it means - Hindustan Times
articles.description: MEA spokesperson Arindam Bagchi reiterated India’s position that Brics should be expanded through “full consultation and consensus” among members of the bloc. | Latest News India
articles.content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Thursday confirmed his in-person participation in the Brics Summit in Johannesburg during August 22-24, ending speculation that the meet could become a virtual affair … [+4112 chars]
